title: Could you please tell me what font this is?
content:
several years ago, my company hired an advertising agency to make a folder. I would like to find the font used.  
Thank you

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414195523im_/http:/typophile.com/files/font_4264.jpg)
author: poupie08

comments.content: My guess would be Trade Gothic LT Std Bold (caps) and Light
